text: polonnaruwa disa samuha am.pi. saratharaliya mal dasa lakshayak puja kirime maha pinkama ha bodhi puja malawe, 14 wana warshika maha pinkama mayi 30 wana da rathri 7.30 ta unagalawehera rajamaha wiharaya, bubula shri bodhirukkharamaya, si.pi.pura isuru sumana wiharaya yana wiharayan hi adhipathi ‘girithale nyanissara mahimiyange’ anushasana paridi dayaka sabhawa, sethsara padanama, thriwidha hamudawa, polisiya ha pradeshawasinge upakarayen maha sangharathnaye da pradeshaye mathi amathithumanlage da, pradeshaye welanda wyaparika prajawage da sahabhagithwayen unagala rajamaha wiharastha maha bodhin wahanse abiyasadi janadhipathithuma pramukha amathya mandalayatath, rata surakina thriwidha hamudawatath, polisiyatath seth patha ema pinkama pawathwe.
